message: Starting analysis of JSON registry operations in review spawning flow
Found _maybe_auto_submit_phase_for_review function. Analyzing registry operations. CRITICAL FINDING: Lines 3614-3617 show registry WRITES ARE COMMENTED OUT!
Mapping registry operations. Found that submit_phase_for_review DOES persist to disk (line 4931-4933), but _maybe_auto_submit does NOT. Continuing analysis...
Compiling comprehensive registry operations map. Found all key operations in review flow. Now documenting complete findings...

COMPLETED: Comprehensive JSON registry operations map created for review spawning flow. Documented all LockedRegistryFile usages, registry reads/writes, and identified root cause: _maybe_auto_submit_phase_for_review (lines 3614-3617) has disk writes COMMENTED OUT, causing _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers to read stale 'ACTIVE' status from disk instead of 'AWAITING_REVIEW'. Manual submit works because it persists changes (lines 4931-4933). Complete findings documented with file:line citations.
